english.segment1: We could talk for hours. It doesn't matter. You don't hear a word I say. 'Cause you don't listen when I speak. So I'll sing instead
english.segment2: La la la la la I love you. Ooh.. I really do. If you ever paid attention. I think you would love me too
english.segment3: You say you want to know me. I get the feeling that you're telling me a lie. 'Cause every time I talk about emotion. You shake your pretty head and say goodbye

english.segment5: Why do I love you like I do. When you ignore me. Just like the sun ignores the moon. All you see is you
